snippet: Our colleagues on the Media Decoder blog report that readers who subscribe to the magazine by April 22 could be chosen to attend the White House Correspondents' Association Dinner as a guest of the magazine.
abstract: Our colleagues on the Media Decoder blog report that readers who subscribe to the magazine by April 22 could be chosen to attend the White House Correspondents' Association Dinner as a guest of the magazine.

headline.main: The New Republic Hawks Access to a 'Once in a Lifetime' Dinner
